title: EXPLOITATION - Start EoW Batch after CSD Migration

task_list.instruction_title: _Launch EoW Batch by following the below steps (hold done in IP Task [PRE-15054](PRE-15054_116110145.html))_
Unhold the Secli Batch : **P007CLI_CJO004, P004CLI_CJO004 et P001CLI_CJO004**
Unholder les jobs suivants : 01-START-EOD plus tous les job du folder P_HOS_CORE-BANKING (uniquement les jobs pas le folder).
